Title: Silverlight Bridge
Description: Silverlight Bridge is Silverlight File Manager. Runs in and out of web browser. Allows drag and drop of files between the local file system and the server.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight Bridge is Silverlight File Manager. Runs in and out of web browser. Allows drag and drop of files between the local file system and the server.
  • This project requires Silverlight 4 (currently in Beta)
  • ASP.NET 4.0 (currently in Beta)
  • VS2010 (currently in Beta)
  • It will NOT run on ASP.NET 3.5 and Visual Studio 2008
  • Not for production use



  • Allows files to be moved by Dragging and Dropping
  • Allows multiple files to be uploaded
  • Allows Folders to be Created, Updated, and Deleted
  • Allows Files to be Uploaded, and Deleted
